house_listing.house_description: Lots of possibilities in this 2 or 3 bedrm home. Has a mother-in-law suite with bathroom and separate entrance, built in shelving in lr and dr. Newer cabinets in the eat-in kitchen, 8x8 basement, screened back porch, large flag-stoned entrance foyer, pull down stairway. Needs tlc.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Attic, Cable TV, Capecod Style, Fenced, Guest Room, Utility Room
